Module Manipulators

Package manipulators

This package contains example manipulator models.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Crane
    A simple arm with a stand servo to set the direction to target, femur and tibia linear motors to position the gripper in the directed plane. 3DOF gripper servos directs the gripper.
    LGripper
    A test gripper with not actual gripping capabilities.
    Lift
    For testing of closed-chain only.
    Lift2
    For testing of closed-chain only.
    LinearGripper
    A simple gripper with two symmetric linear motors.
    ManipulatorWith3DOFGripper
    An upper class for all manipulators that have 3 servos to control the gripper pose.
    RedundantArm
    A redundant arm with a stand servo to set the direction to target, femur servo, 90° femur, tibia and finally 90° tibia servo. 3DOF gripper servos directs the gripper.
    SimpleArm
    A simple arm with a stand servo to set the direction to target, femur and tibia servo to position the gripper in the directed plane. 3DOF gripper servos directs the gripper.
    SimpleArm2
    A simple arm with a stand servo to set the direction to target, femur and tibia joints to position the gripper in the directed plane. 3DOF gripper servos directs the gripper.

    In contrast to SimpleArm, the joints are not modelled as servo but with closed kinematic chains and linear motors.
    SimpleArmLinear
    A simple arm with a stand servo to set the direction to target, femur servo and tibia linear motor to position the gripper in the directed plane. 3DOF gripper servos directs the gripper.
    ThreeFingerGripper
    A simple gripper with three symmetric linear motors.
    Tripod
    For testing of closed-chain only.
    TripodArm
    An arm with closed chain (type tripod) that controls the main arm and a further tibia servo to position the gripper.
